website_summaries.verdict: An LED light that can either magnetically attach to your vehicle, or free-stand on the road for extra protection.
pros: Has a strobe function to attract attention and a solid function to double as extra needed light at night
Nice large size to attract attention
Case makes them easy to store in the car and has enough space for extra batteries
cons: This product requires batteries, but batteries are not included

customer_reviews.title: Concept and design are great. Unfortunately the quality isn't there
customer_reviews.text: Concept and design are great. Unfortunately the quality isn't there. Bought the 2 pack flare set for our two cars. One flare in each set has a defective switch and wont stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: mdh55

customer_reviews.title: Good size, No fires
customer_reviews.text: I just got these, figuring they'd be a good option for our vehicles. I put the batteries in, did a quick service check of the lights and the magnetic base, as well as the stand; so far I feel confident enough they will perform well enough if/when needed. The reflective taping appears to be of fair enough material and quality, but time will tell. The LED seems to have enough lumen/ brightness/ power to show up at a good enough distance, especially in the dark. If I get a chance to test this theory, I'll update later.
customer_reviews.author: James Ross

customer_reviews.title: On the way to work one day there was a real bad accident. I arrive before the police and emergency ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Wislights LED emergency lights approximately a month ago. On the way to work one day there was a real bad accident . I arrive before the police and emergency vehicles after calling 911 ,checked on everyone. I lit up the area with the LED lights to ensure no one would have another accident are would hit me and until the emergency vehicles and police arrived. ( PLEASE people move over if you see a accident not just for me, " The emergency personnel .) "Thank you" I do recommend wislights there EZ to put together you can see the lights for long distance ,nice Storage box and compact. This is why I am giving it a five-star.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Missing critical hardware!
customer_reviews.text: One on the boxes that came in the bundle did not have the plastic batterie holder that gose inside the flare. Its a cool product but i cant use the other set its a huge let down to buy something that works well but the company cant even makesure it comes with all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rada

customer_reviews.title: safety first
customer_reviews.text: We now have 12 of these. We carry two in each vehicle and one on each individual in our family. In the long winter nights we use them when we are walking to the bus stop etc. A young man was killed recently near out home crossing the street at night. His funeral was held 2 days ago. I think he would still be alive if he had been carrying one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I feel a hell of a lot safer with these in the car. Although I drive like a Grandma on Sunday when the babies are in the car, it’s good to have in the event of an emergency for you or some other motorist you may need to help, God forbid. Lights pose as flashlight or hazard blinkers. One of my better purchases. Plus it’s a good somewhat compact size to have in your trunk or cab and doesn’t get in the way of things you already have back there
customer_reviews.author: Jamall Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order on time and in excellent condition. I also gave a set to my best friend for Christmas and he loved them. Two satisfied customers! The magnets seem very strong, the stands are solid and the items fit the storage case well. These come without batteries but I knew that when I ordered. It would be nice to include batteries. Overall I'm happy with this product and can recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: One of the  two doesn't even work
customer_reviews.text: Minus 4-stars because of quality control. One of the two doesn't work. Switch and/or contact issue -- how could this have not been caught by inspection? Both battery packs work ok with the one, but neither works with the defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Mochni (Hopi: Talking Bird)

customer_reviews.title: Battery cartridge weak link
customer_reviews.text: Inserted batteries into one of the flares, no issues; although battery compartment/cartridge seemed a little on the flimsy side. However, as I was inserting the batteries into the cartridge of the second flare, the tip of the metal contact on one end separated from the cartridge. I didn't even realize it initially. But when I touched the broken end of the battery cartridge, I received a significant 'shock' to the tip of my finger (felt like a yellow jacket sting)! Upon inspection, could see the construction of the battery cartridge was the weak link in the design. Will be returning these, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TWK

customer_reviews.title: so one out of three in California is not good. The tow truck driver said it made it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding and very visible. I have already used them to help a motorist stranded on a dark winding highway. The CHP said they could see them from over a 1/2 mile away and were very impressed ... now that is something given tow passed by, so one out of three in California is not good. The tow truck driver said it made it quiet easy for him to see the vehicle that was in need of help. Derrick Preston
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Preston

customer_reviews.title: Work OK but not rugged in construction
customer_reviews.text: The pair I bought work OK, and the magnets are strong enough to hold them on a perpendicular ferrous metal surface. However, they are not as bright as a traditional road flare, and they are not very solid in construction. I am now looking for something battery powered like these but with brighter light and definitely of more durable construction.
customer_reviews.author: T. Willette

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, I bought one for myself and even my X wife. Wow, they work great and have a couple features as strobe, constant on, can be used on the ground, attached to your car and even an emergency flashlight! And it doesn't cost a lot for the safety of my daughters. I haven't used them in a real life situation and I am hoping that I don't but the tests look great!
customer_reviews.author: Truck Owner

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These road flares are sturdy and bright. The magnet is really strong. I bought a set for my son and a set for my wife to make pulling over a little safer. I’ve helped people many times on the Interstate Highway or side of the road and it’s dangerous. This product is simple and safe to use while providing that extra attention grabber for oncoming motorists.
customer_reviews.author: Dog&Suds

customer_reviews.title: like that it stands upright and uses only 3 AAA ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright LED light...like that it stands upright and uses only 3 AAA batteries...good case that you can store extra batteries in. Suggest you put in batteries before putting it in your vehicle..That way they are ready to use..Suggest a good brand of batteries so they do not leak and ruin these units.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Most of them worked
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 sets to use as lighting around our camp for the 4th of July. They are bright and we liked the options (steady light, flashing and flashlight) as did our grandsons. They were much easier to use than flares and last as long as your batteries hold out. The kids could run around with them, much safer around kids than flares. The only issue we had was of the 8, 1 did not work. I even tried using a battery pack from one that did work and it still wouldn't light. I would recommend them even thought we had 1 that didn't work. I'll see how seller responds to this.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Not to great for highway use.
customer_reviews.text: Regular road flares are much brighter, drivers can see these but not from far. Good for city streets but they didn’t work to great on the freeway. Two were ran over and broke into pieces. Luckily I had road flares too so I set those up and drivers moved over a lot further away
customer_reviews.author: morgan stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great Marking Lights
customer_reviews.text: I use them for marking out a drone landing area combine this with a drone landing pad, and no one will bother you while you fly. It should be noted that I don't fly drones at night, but in the evening well before sunset. Even at those times they are still very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with the WISLIGHT flares I bought on Amazon. They are safe because they are LED lights rather than flares with a flame. They are very well packaged to carry in the trunk of a car and they are very easy to use. I especially like the service that WISLIGHT provided when I had a problem. Their response was swift, completely satisfactory and exceeded my expectations. They need to correct the drawing of the battery holder in their directions. It should be turned in the other direction.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Kalamarides, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Will work out just fine
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars, I'm not sure why some of the reviews say these aren't very bright. When I tried them out today in daylight they were just fine. The only thing I am upset about is they aren't very well constructed. One red tab to open the box broke off on each of them they pop back on but right back off when opening. Also the reflecting tape has unwrapped on two of them but wrapped back on but will it stay? Other then that they are just fine sm lt weight and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I consider a strobe light; it's a flashing light but nothing close to the brightness of a strobe. Still, they're good for the purpose they are designed for; I was disappointed in the strobe function.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was great and they are exactly what they claim to be. Except my package only came with 2 stands so the other 2 won't stand up on their own. Disappointed but don't hate it. Edit: After seeing this review which was originally a 3 Star, the company contacted me and offered to send me a new product with the missing stands. I really appreciated their dedication.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging but.....
customer_reviews.text: Items seem small, the feet seem small to hold item upright on road when other vehicles drive by and any gusts of wind may knock them over. Magnet on bottom seems to hold unit on vehicle but if you are off roadside in ditch these may not be well seen. A sturdier base would be a better design. Bright light with strobe very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bourque

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend relying on them alone.
customer_reviews.text: Probably good for nighttime emergencies, but in the daytime they don't provide much signaling to oncoming traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright. You will definitely see them. I bought on pair and had to get a second for my other car. Love the flashlight mode. Perfect for a camper and boat also.
customer_reviews.author: James L Butts Jr

customer_reviews.title: Safety and Value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for each vehicle. Always should be prepared. Hope I never have to use but great knowing I have my safety equipment with me at all times when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: michael jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect haz-mat fuses.
customer_reviews.text: When I put in battery's they worked very well. I haven't used them in a real world situation yet, but I believe there're going to be just fine. I'm a trucker who hauls haz-mat and real flares just won't do (you know with them being real fire and all... can you say Bomb !!!).
customer_reviews.author: Linda Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Stop Shopping Around and Buy These Today! Buy a pair for all of your loved ones also. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These flares are super cool! They will magnetize to your car or you can use the stands. The put off a super bright light and have three types of lighting. I feel much safer riding around with these in my car. I wish I had a pair for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Best thing i ever bought on amazon This is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Best thing i ever bought on amazon This is so useful and highly recommended I think it must be in all cars Definitely im buying few more boxes to give it to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Al Zain

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of road flares. Every car should have a set because you just never know. Love that you can set them to stand on the road or attach them to the car itself because of the magnetic base.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, good magnet, nice case
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice. Does not come with batteries though. The magnet is pretty strong, bright lights, nice reflective tape too. Good buy for your car emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But when I checked them the base was easy to open up and the magnet on the bottoms ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use them yet. But when I checked them the base was easy to open up and the magnet on the bottoms were very strong. There is plenty of room to keep batteries in the case so they won't drain down by accident.
customer_reviews.author: David Davis

customer_reviews.title: This could save your life. Don’t drive without one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome visibility for miles. Great magnetic base allows use on side of the vehicle, on top the vehicle or in the included stand Eliminates fear of fire but still warns other drivers. No need to keep relighting
customer_reviews.author: maria christensen

customer_reviews.title: The first set came in with one not working and ...
customer_reviews.text: The first set came in with one not working and some of the reflective strips coming loose. Returned item. Got credit. Seller replaced at no charge. The new units are functional. Customer service was positive.
customer_reviews.author: shawneeray

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: First purchased these for my Grandson who has been driving for one year. Then, purchased for my mother and me!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: If it's can avoid you from danger in breakdown situations then it's worth owning.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: These appear to be a great value. They are bright and cleverly designed to ...
customer_reviews.text: After recently having a blow-out at 11pm on I-94 in remote eastern Montana, I decided that never again would I be without road flares. These appear to be a great value. They are bright and cleverly designed to stand up, yet take little room in storage. I will order another set. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: doc1950

customer_reviews.title: When do you break down - almost never on a nice day, easily seen...
customer_reviews.text: We really like these versus road flares - more versatile and less volatile than flares - recommend keeping the batteries separate in the case for just in time use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: And the base was sturdy when opened
customer_reviews.text: Keeping these in my car for emergencies. Worked well in a dark room in my house. The magnet on the bottom seemed strong when attached to my refrigerator. And the base was sturdy when opened. I hope I never need to use these!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Gives off good light that can be seen from a distance
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I wish they were usb chargeable. Gives off good light that can be seen from a distance. The magnetic bas is a nice feature allowing you to stick them on the trunk or roof of the vehicle when stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, compact and functional. Haven't needed to use in an emergency but glad to have a set in my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What a great little item for a car emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: What a great little item for a car emergency kit. Bright easy to use no risk of inadvertent ignition from the old style flairs.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: A good value for the price but not the best quality. I had to reattach some of the reflective tape when I first opened them.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin1958

customer_reviews.title: Great device to warn of  a emergency
customer_reviews.text: Keep it in my SUV for emergency road warning to other motorists of a accident, broke down car, or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Harold  Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome.There bright , has 3 light setting , very well made. Will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro frank

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't needed to use it yet but I tested it out when it first arrived. It's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The red solid and red flashing lights are great! So bright!! However, the white light is pretty wimpy. Would not be good for a flashlight. If the white light was as bright as the red light, it would definitely be a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN M KAMMERER

customer_reviews.title: An essential piece of my road emergency kit for my ...
customer_reviews.text: An essential piece of my road emergency kit for my car for whenever my wife or I are on the road. It keeps other drivers alert to my situation on the side of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Smith

customer_reviews.title: These Electric Flares are the best
customer_reviews.text: Traveling on Interstate 80 with friends pulling a 5th wheel, we had to pull over due to a broken spring. The first items out of my truck storage box were the Electric Flares. I will be purchasing more for me nd my friends
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I tested them and they are bright. They are in the emergency kit in the car so I really won't know till I need them. But they seem great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Protect your loved ones
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Bright and eye-catching. This is a must buy to help protect your loved ones from distracted drivers should they have car trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Auto safety in a box.
customer_reviews.text: These are bright and have 3 reflective rings. I have 3 sets now. Rugged plastic case. Has room for extra batteries. No more dangerous phosphorus road flairs.
customer_reviews.author: Civic SI

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights are bright and catching to the eye from a long distance. The structural integrity isn't as durable as I thought they would be, but they are still a good product to have in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Webster

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: When they work they are great! Eats batteries like crazy though.
customer_reviews.author: FranciscoB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I won't have to use them but they will work on and emergency
customer_reviews.author: Mark from DC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I purchased two sets last year for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I purchased two sets last year for my kids. I am now purchasing more for the rest of my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Leemon

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be bright and tall enough to be seen ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be bright and tall enough to be seen from distance. I have them in a car emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: David at beach

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an emergency kit with other products. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wislight vs a reflective triangle no match. The distance ...
customer_reviews.text: Wislight vs a reflective triangle no match . The distance seen by oncoming traffic is well worth the safety they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Replaced my cone flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Replaced my cone flashlight. No flame, but not as bright as flair. Will work well at night.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: should get a person's attention just fine.
customer_reviews.text: They blink and flash, quite bright, should get a person's attention just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Graidian

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: Like they come in a nice box and they bright
customer_reviews.author: grant mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Well 1 box didn’t have both magnets for stands for the flares. Not a good start!!!
customer_reviews.author: sam trigg

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, convenient case
customer_reviews.text: Light is nice and bright, and I like that it can be used as a flashlight. There's also enough room in the cases for batteries so they can be put into the lights only when needed, avoiding unnecessary draining. I ordered a second set for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, will be able to save lives in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: steamboiler

customer_reviews.title: USE CREATIVELY!
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my classes. It marks the limits Robots can go in the halls. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then thought
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright and easy to use. Very compact case and fit in back of car nicely. Don't know why but thought would be larger. Good magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Could save an accident, or your life
customer_reviews.text: Very useful product. Bought one for each of the family members to keep in their car.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works A+++++++++
customer_reviews.text: Works just perfect just need to add batteries to it works like it should
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to use and safer than the lit flares ...
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use and safer than the lit flares and Very Compact !! Just remember to change the batteries once a year.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Cool design but turns off while in use at times I have to take out the battery or shake it which kills time
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great solutions for road emergency stop, sadly it does not includes batteries
customer_reviews.author: german muñoz

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I installed fresh Dura Cell batteries in these and neither one would light. I returned them. Don't waste your time or money on these.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights visible during daylight for approximately 1/2 a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Rnilsen

customer_reviews.title: After using them for one week they stopped working and ...
customer_reviews.text: After using them for one week they stopped working and I was using them at least 4 times a week I drive a truck and sometimes I have to park in the middle of the road so i needed them 👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Isidro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These battery operated LED flares are awesome. I have a pair in each vehicle trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kjoe

customer_reviews.title: Both worked after installing batteries not supplied
customer_reviews.text: Both had a circle of the reflective silver tape coming undone (see pic). I taped up ALL the end cuts. Both DID work ok after I installed MY (3) AAA batteries in ea. hence the 3 stars. It IS cheapo, junk plastic. I put MY extra spare batteries in the case, + pray I'll never have to use them. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than pictured, but will get the job done. Very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kerns

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic base is friendly design and its bright white light is useful as a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for camping. The magnetic base is friendly design and its bright white light is useful as a flashlight. What i like most is the red eye-catching flares mode, helps a lot to let my friend find me and did not get lost. I'd like to give a generous 5 - star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright & easy
customer_reviews.text: Look great, hope I never need them on the road. May use the camping.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: This product is totally garbage, it deserves not even 1 star
customer_reviews.text: This product is totally garbage, it deserves not even 1 star. It won't stay turned on, tried to stick it to vehicle and it keeps sliding. Just a waste of money, have seen better product similar to this in the dollar tree. Save your money and time ... invest in quality for road side emergency equipment.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your trunk, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the car kit, meets the need and versatile. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bufalino

customer_reviews.title: Nice case also
customer_reviews.text: I had an older style of this idea, and needed them for an accident I arrived on, and had to direct traffic. They didn't work out too well (not this brand, not this exact style, old bulb types) Having now been able to look at how bright these are, I wish I had them that night. Much brighter, much safer to use. Nice case also.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

product_meta.title: WISLIGHT LED Emergency Roadside Flashing Flares Safety Strobe Light - Road Warning Beacon, Magnetic Base, Detachable Stand, Storage Case (2 Cases = 4 PCS, Battery Not Included)
product_meta.description:
Size:2CASE

Battery powered early warning safety light, AAA*3 for each pc (Not Included), NO Fire NO Fumes NO Fuss.

3 Operation Modes: Solid / Strobe / Flashlight. "Solid/Strobe(SOS)" when attracting attention, "Flashlight" when need illumation.

Ultra bright red LED 360 degrees on the top, reflective tapes on the beacon barrel. Eye-catching in emergency night, visible from 3,000 FT.

Magnetic base, free-standing on vehicles. Leave your hands off to get more help.

With extra elevated base (removable) for uneven road, put it at the right place to attention others.

Strong durable storage case. Packaged into a weatherproof case, easy and safe to go.

2 Cases Package=4 PCS, GOOD VALUE

Suitable occasions

- Car repair tool kit, Camping, Natural disasters, Emergency power shortage etc.
feature_bullets: Battery powered, AAA*3 each pc (Not Included), NO Fire NO Fumes NO Fuss.
3 Operation Modes: Solid / Strobe(SOS) / Flashlight. "Solid/Strobe(SOS)" when attracting attention, "Flashlight" when need illumation.
Ultra bright red LED 360 degrees on the top reflective tapes on the beacon barrel. Outstanding in emergency night, visible from 3,000 FT.
Magnetic base, free-standing on vehicles. With extra elevated base (removable) for uneven road.
2 CASES PACKAGE, GOOD VALUE. Strong durable storage case. Packaged into a weatherproof case, easy and safe to go.
